error.no_mining_device: Have no mining device. Must select at least one mining device (GPU or CPU)
error.no_mining_crypto_for_device: Have no mining crypto. Must select at least one mining crypto

home.benchmark_to_show_erning: Führe eine Bewertung durch, um Einnahmensschätzungen anzuzeigen
home.you_are_anonymous_mining: Du befindest dich im anonymen Miningmodus. Du solltest dich für die Bezahlung anmelden.
home.miner_not_effective: Derzeitiger Miner ist nicht effektiv. Versuche, zu anderem Miner zu wechseln.
home.cpu_miner_not_found: CPU miner is not found. Maybe miner is deleted or CPU cryptoes are unselected in 'Preferred Algorithms' . Please check on 'Configure-Preferred Algorithms' menu. CPU cryptoes list [{{cpuCryptoes}}]

hardware_detail.current_evaluate_title: Bitte warte, dies könnte einige Minuten dauern.

setting.auto_start_description: Beginnt automatisch zu minen, wenn der Computer nicht verwendet wird und beendet den Vorgang, wenn der Computer wieder verwendet wird.
setting.auto_launch_description: Starte Miner automatisch, wenn der Computer gestartet wird
setting.auto_mining: Starte Mining, wenn der Computer nicht verwendet wird
setting.miner_off_notification_description: An email will be sent if miner is stopped unexpectedly
setting.signin_required: Please sign in to use this feature
setting.preferred_algorithms_explaination: Select algorithm(s) that you want to mine
setting.preferred_algorithms_warning: Please select at least one algorithm
setting.cpu_mining_description: Automatically start cpu mining when start mining
setting.gpu_mining_description: Automatically start gpu mining when start mining

auto_update.new_version_downloading: Version {{version}} wurde gefunden und wird heruntergeladen
auto_update.new_version_downloaded: Neue Version heruntergeladen. Willst du die Applikation neu starten?
auto_update.no_do_it_later: Nein, ich will später neu starten

main.error_cannot_connect_pool: Can not connect pool ({{poolinfo}}). Please check your connection and firewall to make sure port {{port}} is not blocked.
main.miner_stopped_cannot_connect_stats_port: Port '{{port}}' is in use. Please make sure that no other application is using port {{port}}.
main.not_support_system: Device is not supported or out of memory. Please check on 'Configure-Preferred Algorithms' menu. Minable algorithms: [{{algorithms}}]
main.validate_fail_out_of_memory: Insufficient Video device memory. VRAM must be at least {{vram}} MB.
main.predict_dag_expire_date: DAG size of {{crypto}} is {{dagSize}} MB. Your Video RAM ({{curRAM}} MB) can mine to {{expireAt}}

miner_downloader.title: Downloading mining tool
miner_downloader.error_hash_verify_failed: Has some error while download mining tool, please try again
miner_downloader.error_unzip: Error while decompress zip file, please try again

estimation.setup_wattage: Click to setup wattage for more accurate estimation
estimation.mining_electricity_consumption: Mining electricity consumption of your GPUs/CPUs
estimation.use_detected_wattage: Use wattage data obtained from Miner

pay_me_now.payment_verification_explain: To verify if your account can receive payments from Freedom!, we will pay this account an amount of $0.01
pay_me_now.payment_not_found: User payment not found! Please update payment method at Freedom! dashboard.

instruction.instruction_tooltip: Some tips to improve mining performance or fix mining issues

affiliate_info.affiliate_description: Share your referral link to your friend and earn commission, see more detail {{here}}.
